name: Player Legendaries
flavor: Look at that, they are everywhere!
text:
Creating a legendary as a playable character needs you to meet the following requirements:
- 20 total character levels (Stored GM exp counts towards that)
- A Platinum Rank character
- 10 quest participations (Player or GM)
- Being a server member for at least 2 months
To create a legendary, please make a post inside the <#1271585309595009074> forum.

**Getting more legendary slots:**
- Each 50 levels beyond 20 (so 70, 120 etc)
- Prior Legendary has to be at least Platinum Rank

**Legendary Moves:**
- Instead of getting an egg move at Bronze, legendary pokemon get access to their legendary move. At later ranks, they gain egg moves as normal
- To use a Legendary Move, type /legend_move instead of /move 
- Legendary Moves can only be used Rank times on a quest
- There is a 2 round cooldown between each Legendary Move
- They don’t count towards your move slots
